notesStmt.note: This manuscript contains two tracts of text describing Mandalas: Maṇḍaladevatāpūjana (title from colophon, f. 4v), and Liṅgatobhadralakṣaṇa (title from colophon, f. 5v). Poleman catalogs the manuscript under the latter title. F. 4v supplies title as "aliṅgatobhadralakṣaṇa," but this is probably an error for "atha liṅgatobhadralakṣaṇa."
Copied by Rāma Brāhmaṇ in Kāśī.

Begins, f. 1v: śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ. prāgudīcyāṁ gutā[?] rekhāḥ kuryād ekonaviṁśatiḥ khaṁḍedus tripadaḥ koṇe śṛṁkhalā pañcabhiḥ padaiḥ ekādaśapadā vallī bhadraṁ tu navabhiḥ padaiḥ caturviṁśat padā vāpī paridhir viṁśatiḥ padaiḥ
Text ends, f. 5v: dalāni śvetavarṇāni yad vā citrāṇi kalpayet tisro rekhā vahiḥ kāryāḥ sitaraktāḥ sitāḥ kramāt atrāpi prāguktā vrahmādyā maṁḍaladevatāḥ sthāpayet
Colophon, f. 5v: iti liṁgatobhadralakṣaṇaṁ likhītaṁ śrīrāmabr̄ahmaṇ kāśīmadhye śubham astu
